title: Learning Dexterous Manipulation from Suboptimal Experts
abstract: We present a method for learning dexterous manipulation skills from suboptimal human demonstrations using reinforcement learning.

title: VLA-Hand: Vision-Language-Action Models for Dexterous Manipulation
abstract: This paper introduces a vision-language-action model specifically designed for dexterous hand manipulation tasks.

title: Imitation Learning for Complex Dexterous Manipulation
abstract: We explore imitation learning techniques for teaching robots complex dexterous manipulation skills through expert demonstrations.

title: Optimal Control Strategies for Multi-Fingered Robotic Hands
abstract: This work presents novel control strategies for coordinated movement of multi-fingered robotic hands in manipulation tasks.

title: Trajectory Optimization for Dexterous Grasping
abstract: We propose optimization techniques for generating smooth and efficient trajectories for dexterous grasping operations.

title: Policy Gradient Methods for Robotic Hand Control
abstract: We present a novel reinforcement learning approach for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. Our method demonstrates significant improvements in sample efficiency and task success rates compared to existing approaches.

title: Sample-Efficient Learning for Dexterous Grasping
abstract: We present a novel reinforcement learning approach for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. Our method demonstrates significant improvements in sample efficiency and task success rates compared to existing approaches.

title: Advanced Dexterous Manipulation Systems: A Comprehensive Review
abstract: This comprehensive review examines the current state of dexterous manipulation systems, covering hardware advances, control algorithms, and future research directions.
conference: IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA)

title: VLA-Based Dexterous Manipulation Planning
abstract: We introduce a vision-language-action model specifically designed for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. The model integrates visual perception, natural language understanding, and motor control for improved manipulation capabilities.

title: Adaptive Control Strategies for Dexterous Manipulation
abstract: This paper presents novel control strategies for coordinated movement of multi-fingered robotic hands in manipulation tasks. Our approach addresses the challenges of high-dimensional control and contact dynamics.

title: Force Control in Dexterous Grasping Systems
abstract: This paper presents novel control strategies for coordinated movement of multi-fingered robotic hands in manipulation tasks. Our approach addresses the challenges of high-dimensional control and contact dynamics.

title: Multi-Agent RL for Coordinated Finger Movement
abstract: We present a novel reinforcement learning approach for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. Our method demonstrates significant improvements in sample efficiency and task success rates compared to existing approaches.

title: Language-Guided Manipulation with Robotic Hands
abstract: We introduce a vision-language-action model specifically designed for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. The model integrates visual perception, natural language understanding, and motor control for improved manipulation capabilities.

title: One-Shot Imitation for Dexterous Tasks
abstract: This work explores imitation learning techniques for teaching robots complex dexterous manipulation skills through expert demonstrations. We show that our approach can learn intricate manipulation behaviors from limited demonstration data.

title: Learning from Demonstration for Dexterous Manipulation
abstract: This work explores imitation learning techniques for teaching robots complex dexterous manipulation skills through expert demonstrations. We show that our approach can learn intricate manipulation behaviors from limited demonstration data.

title: Multimodal Learning for Dexterous Robot Control
abstract: We introduce a vision-language-action model specifically designed for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. The model integrates visual perception, natural language understanding, and motor control for improved manipulation capabilities.

title: Expert Demonstration Analysis in Hand Manipulation
abstract: This work explores imitation learning techniques for teaching robots complex dexterous manipulation skills through expert demonstrations. We show that our approach can learn intricate manipulation behaviors from limited demonstration data.

title: Vision-Language-Action Models for Hand Manipulation
abstract: We introduce a vision-language-action model specifically designed for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. The model integrates visual perception, natural language understanding, and motor control for improved manipulation capabilities.

title: Real-Time Control of Anthropomorphic Hands
abstract: This paper presents novel control strategies for coordinated movement of multi-fingered robotic hands in manipulation tasks. Our approach addresses the challenges of high-dimensional control and contact dynamics.

title: Energy-Efficient Control of Robotic Hands
abstract: We propose optimization techniques for generating smooth and efficient trajectories for dexterous grasping operations. The method considers both kinematic constraints and dynamic stability requirements.

title: Optimization-Based Grasp Synthesis
abstract: We propose optimization techniques for generating smooth and efficient trajectories for dexterous grasping operations. The method considers both kinematic constraints and dynamic stability requirements.

title: Motion Planning for Multi-Finger Manipulation
abstract: We propose optimization techniques for generating smooth and efficient trajectories for dexterous grasping operations. The method considers both kinematic constraints and dynamic stability requirements.

title: Optimal Control for Multi-Fingered Robotic Hands
abstract: This paper presents novel control strategies for coordinated movement of multi-fingered robotic hands in manipulation tasks. Our approach addresses the challenges of high-dimensional control and contact dynamics.

title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Dexterous Hand Manipulation
abstract: We present a novel reinforcement learning approach for dexterous hand manipulation tasks. Our method demonstrates significant improvements in sample efficiency and task success rates compared to existing approaches.

title: Behavioral Cloning for Multi-Finger Robot Hands
abstract: This work explores imitation learning techniques for teaching robots complex dexterous manipulation skills through expert demonstrations. We show that our approach can learn intricate manipulation behaviors from limited demonstration data.
